title: Glimpses of Eastern India
brief_description: An American girl visits her former student friend in Calcutta, tours the surrounding district and flies to the Himalayas for a short trip. Shows ancient ruins, village life, cottage industries, handwoven fabrics and magnificent variety of landscape, festivals, temples, a Buddhist monastery, the tea estates, seaside resorts.
